thread.title: Bro Comes Back From Hiking Pacific Crest Trail, Lives In A Storage Unit To Stave Mnoey, Makes It Unbelievably Sick
thread.title_full: Bro Comes Back From Hiking Pacific Crest Trail, Lives In A Storage Unit To Stave Mnoey, Makes It Unbelievably Sick

author: Cass Anderson
title: Bro Comes Back From Hiking Pacific Crest Trail, Lives In A Storage Unit To Stave Mnoey, Makes It Unbelievably Sick
text:
This bro had just gotten back from hiking the Pacific Crest Trail, a 2,569-mile trail that spans from the U.S.-Mexico border in Southern California all the way up to the Washington-Canada border. It’s the second longest component of the ‘Triple Crown of Hiking’, and with most hikers covering 20 miles/day on the hike it takes a LONG time to traverse.
Prior to embarking on the Pacific Crest Trail , most people will put their belongings into a storage unit and get rid of their apartments, or sublet their houses, because it takes the better part of a year for some to complete this hike. It appears as if this bro was looking to lifehack his return to society, and upon returning back to everyday life he dumped all of his belongings into a storage unit where he then lived while he got back on his feet.
From what I’ve seen in this video, it looks like his storage unit is infinitely better than my first NYC apartment, and I think this bro might have a career in outfitting small/livable storage units for others. This is definitely a service people would get on board with.
(h/t r/videos )
